thread.title: Actress Nicole Kidman Meets Mickey Mouse at Walt Disney World Resort
thread.title_full: Actress Nicole Kidman Meets Mickey Mouse at Walt Disney World Resort

author: Anne Macklin
title: Actress Nicole Kidman Meets Mickey Mouse at Walt Disney World Resort
text:
Academy Award winning actress, Nicole Kidman, took her family on a Walt Disney World Resort vacation this week. While it was the first visit for Nicole’s family, she reminisced about her last visit to the resort over 20 years ago! Nicole was excited to introduce her girls to magic of Disney. First stop…meeting Mickey Mouse , of course!
Special thank you to Chloe Rice for the cute photo.
